entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
